website_summaries.verdict: We appreciate the NuLink's compact design and affordable price, but the noise level may be a consideration for some users.
pros: Includes both continuous and touch inflation modes
Handles all sizes of round balloons
Built-in cable and wire storage compartment
cons: Some reports of nozzles not activating properly

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a life saver. I made two balloon arches (6ft and 12ft) for a bridal shower. Saved me hours of time. Other reviews talked about not running it consecutively for hours at a time. I took a few little breaks while blowing them up when the machine started getting warm and it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for balloon arch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go crazy with bridal shower balloon decor. Perfect for this purpose - blows up 100 11” balloons in 20 minutes. Blew up 6”, 9”, 11”, and 17” balloons - 600 balloons in 2 hours decor was amazing. This product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot really fast
customer_reviews.text: The machine was easy to use, but after only blowing up 2 maybe 3 balloons, the machine got really hot and started blowing out hot air. The hot air actually made the balloon pop, so I couldn't even finish my project.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Used for less than 5 minutes and it stopped working, motor blew!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a party that I was decorating this weekend. I was on a time constraint and needed to do a half balloon arch in less than an hour. I started to inflate the balloons and I was excited to see how fast they inflate. I was inflating my 20th balloon and the machine cut off and never turned back on. I had to inflate 75 more balloons by mouth to complete the arch! Needless to say this is a poor quality made machine. Not a happy camper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaisha Schwegler

customer_reviews.title: Save your lung
customer_reviews.text: Makes balloons easy and saves your lungs from all the hard blowing all those 100 balloons that you have to blow for the party. Time will tell how long this machine last. So far I’m happy with the machine
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: We had at least 300 balloons to fill and this was a wonderful help. I am not a professional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the balloon pump to help with decorating a banquet. We had at least 300 balloons to fill and this was a wonderful help. I am not a professional. The air comes out strong. liked the nozzle attachments for the smaller balloons too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great! From the looks of it, I thought it may be a little "toy-like" but turns out, the color/look probably makes it fit in for kids parties. Bottom line, you could inflate hundreds of balloons easily and in record time with this. Power cord also stores inside unit so it stores easily. Great design
customer_reviews.author: Robert Terry Jr

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good. I only wish that it would have a ...
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it once, but so far so good. I only wish that it would have a feature were it would start releasing air when you push the balloon down on the tip, instead of having to use the on and off button. But it served it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Annyanka

customer_reviews.title: you just hold it and like magic 2 seconds later it's a full balloon
customer_reviews.text: They should give you this in the hospital when you have your child! Evey house with kids needs one of these! This asthmatic mom will never be out of breath due to my excessive decorating ideas. One side of the inflators is automatic, you just hold it and like magic 2 seconds later it's a full balloon. Buy several you will be thankful you did.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I blew up all these balloons in gen minutes with this awesome machine! It's the best thing ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jme

customer_reviews.title: Great value and worked great
customer_reviews.text: This was an exceptional product for the price. We made sure not to run it longer than two hours at a time and had no problems - over 500 balloons blown up in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Take2

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inflator to blow up about 200 balloons for a party and it did it with ease. I like the different nozzels for different size balloon openings and also the ability to have it constantly pump air or just when pressing down. I can't speak for the longevity, but if I get a couple more uses out of it then it was worth the money. My only feedback is that it would be nice to be able to set how much air is pumped out to make consistent balloon sizes, but I'm sure that feature cost a lot more and not sure if I'd pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: PARTIES JUST LEVELED UP!
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT! With COVID, we were left with no option than doing a balloon arch ourselves for our daughter’s home graduation. We didn’t expect much at all from this product based on the price and kiddie looks, but it is AMAZING! You can blow up two balloons at once and FAST. I was dreading this day, but my husband and I just blew up 200 balloons in under an hour! It is our firm opinion that every newborn should come with one of these!!! Birthday party planning just got so much more fun. Phenomenal little product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Packs a powerful punch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to accompany my balloon arch kit. Wasn’t sure how well it would work so I had a compressor on backup. WOW this is so powerful and did just the trick. Has an easy use trigger where you don’t have to flip any switches just push the trigger back! It plugs in and has cord storage which is a huge plus. Size wise, it’s smaller than a car battery and doesn’t weigh much. Great for any party!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great value! (so far so good!)
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive pump but it did the job! Definitely don't run it too long at one time (honestly I wouldn't even use the "always on" switch and just use that pressure sensitive option that only turns on when you hold a balloon to the nozzle. I probably blew up 100 balloons in an hour time span and it performed perfectly. It got a little warm at one point but that wasn't too surprising. If this one breaks down the next time I use it, I honestly just might buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Shelby

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is amazing. It is a must have for party planners. It's very easy to use and offers a fast servicing product. I wish I would have purchased one of these years ago. It is lightweight, packaged very nicely, and easy to transport. For this price, I promise you, you will not be disappointed. I priced one of these at Party City and it was 29.99. I was overjoyed when I saw this price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SunSHIne

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help inflate 400 balloons to put into my bosses office for his birthday. LIFE SAVER!!!! did i say LIFE SAVER!!!!! yeah it is, i had them all inflated with in a couple of hours. I also purchased the balloon tying thingy...invest in one too(will save your fingers)...No Helium, just air but so worth the cost. I have used it again for another party and it saves SOOO MUCH TIME! getcha one!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this after watching YouTube videos on balloon clusters that people use this pump for. I only used it once and then it broke. The plastic is cheap and looks like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine !
customer_reviews.text: This little machine worked wonders and saved me a lot of time. I used the ‘on-demand’ nozzle where you just place the balloon on and release so that the machine stops inflating. There is a continuous flow / on switch but that wasn’t necessary for filling up regular balloons. The machine isn’t quiet so make sure those around you will tolerate the added noise. I am definitely happy with this product. Oh, this is the first time I used balloons for decorations so there really no learning curve to use this. Just plug it in and use.
customer_reviews.author: daskat

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for inflating balloons...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had gotten these sooner. Plug it in and push the balloon down the nozzle or the 2 additional adapters and the powerful fan will inflate the balloons. There are two nozzles so two kids can inflate balloons at the same time. Too bad it won't function on battery power, too. Also, it won't blow up the long balloons, according to the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stripped nozzle - I rarely give poor reviews.
customer_reviews.text: One of the nozzles was stripped so every time I tried to blow up a balloon, the nozzle would go shooting off across the room. It's still better than blowing them up by mouth or manual pump but it was certainly an inconvenience having to chase the nozzle around then set it up again. Didn't bother to contact the seller since this was just for one-time use.
customer_reviews.author: Silk

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We do quite a few parties and balloon arches but helium is expensive when doing a lot and sometimes you just need a blown up balloon. This takes literally just a quick second and I love that the cord on it stores away into itself, great purchase that will be used for us!
customer_reviews.author: MelissaM

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any event with balloons
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how or why it took me so long to discover and purchase this. My lungs are grateful. I needed a lot of balloons for a birthday party and I blew up 200+ balloons with no issues. The device is loud when activated to blow up the balloons, so keep that in mind if it might be an issue for you. Easy two handed use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Coley

customer_reviews.title: Never blow a balloon without this pump! A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite investments and is not a requirement when blowing up balloons! Super easy to use although I have yet to master blowing two at once, which many people are able to do! Definitely worth the investment especially when making balloon garland, columns or any balloon art. This brand specifically worked better than others that look the exact same, too. Great purchase - a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: ToyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy but VERY LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but man this thing is loud! I went back to the hand pump for all my balloons because trying to create a surprise for when the other half wakes up at 1am - this is really not the tool unless you have sound proof walls! This is on par with my vacuum cleaner - pretty similar to a high power air bed/pool floaty pump.
customer_reviews.author: Small Fry

customer_reviews.title: Balloon bust
customer_reviews.text: The product just did not work well. We ended up blowing the balloons up ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sakile Camara

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This device is great for blowing up balloons for parties. It goes very quickly and I like that one of the top nozzles can be turned on just by putting end of balloon over it and pressing down.... thus it does not need to be always running. Plus the little compartment to hide the cord is nice feature when storing this.
customer_reviews.author: DragonForest

customer_reviews.title: Must have for balloon parties
customer_reviews.text: What a life saver! I had to blow up about 120 balloons by myself to make a balloon arch and theres no way I could've done it without this. It makes me chuckle to think about all the past parties I've had where 6 or 7 adults would stand around a room huffing and puffing for an hour to blow up 100 balloons. Now I can do that in less than 10 minutes, by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: So much easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a party where I wanted to make a balloon garland and my husband was SO excited. He usually gets stuck blowing up balloons for me because I have some lung issues and this made the whole process so much faster and easier. The comment I kept hearing was "why didn't we get this before?".
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Small, But does a BIG job!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine did an AMAZING job!! I love it!!! Great price too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chanzesmom86

customer_reviews.title: Did it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Filled balloons quickly but don’t inflate too much because your balloons will pop faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders. Mines had no instructions with but I figured it out. The machine gives you 2 options for blowing up balloons. The blue nozzle is for blowing up balloons without the machine constantly working. And the pick nozzle is for blowing up really big ballons or just blowing up ballons with the machine running ( with the bottom switched on). It come with the two little blue attachments that you are able to put on the air blowing side.
customer_reviews.author: Jaquea

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! will be using this for a lot of things!
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to use this for my daughters birthday! I’m making a balloon arch and have to inflate 120 balloon so I purchased this to speed up the process, I can say it definitely will! It takes some getting used to I blew up a couple balloons in my face over inflating then at first but quickly figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: A.Amira

customer_reviews.title: Hurry and buy this if you are doing a balloon arch
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for making a balloon arch! It cut the time down by more than half of what it would have been without it. Trust me, if you’re making an arch or blowing up a bunch of balloons, you don’t want to do it without this machine! It is so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn’t power on
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and plugged it in and it would not power on. I tried multiple outlets in the house and still no power. I had to return. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Enrika Jones

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that for number balloons you might wanna get a narrow nozzle attachment. I'll take this this over constantly buying a helium tank. The balloons unfortunately don't float like if you were to use helium but if you use your imagination and take the initiative it'll be just fine lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to blow up all these balloons!! what a life saver! I would never have been able to do this without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Arellano

customer_reviews.title: gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: You can blow up like 40 balloons in 20 minutes...it's so fast and easy to use. For my son's 1st birthday we used it for a balloon arch and it was awesome and then again for our nanny's birthday hall filled with balloons. Just buy it if you have kids...game changing.
customer_reviews.author: Creekwood

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: You guys.... I cannot express how much this item has changed my life. I have been doing balloons as a side gig for 3 years now. I used to blow balloons up using a hand pump. I bought this and it has taken me probably 1/5th of the time it normally would to produce a 10’ balloon garland. I highly recommend, unless you like the one-arm workout of a pump. ** do not use for balloons smaller than 9”- the electric pump is so powerful it immediately inflated and popped my 5” balloons. 11/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Le

customer_reviews.title: Will never use my O2 again
customer_reviews.text: It blew up my backdrop in half the time! I can breathe! No more blowing balloons. I love the pressure pump feature. And you can pump two at once. Was looking for a plug in which this did the magic. Will never blow up a balloon on my own again. Love this mini air pump.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyInDallas

customer_reviews.title: What a time saver
customer_reviews.text: This balloon pump is perfect. I used it for one party so far and I already think it was worth the purchase. The amount of time it saves you from blowing up balloons is crazy. Some reviews mentioned it was really loud so I was expecting it to sound like a lawn mower...it was loud but not bad at all. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SAVE TIME! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a party with balloons and doubting to buy this amazing tool, please just buy it! Believe me is a life savier! Don't waste your time trying to do it manually with this device you can do the job in practically no time.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! Much smaller than I thought,but that’s no big deal. Pretty much weighs nothing, which is great. I got so many balloons done in little to no time. I’ve used it 5 times now, each time blowing up 100 to 120 balloons.
customer_reviews.author: victoria navarro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: blew up 300 balloons by myself in about 90 minutes! This is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a breath saver! For my daughter's birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a breath saver! For my daughter's birthday it came in handy. It took a while to adjust to the air speed but when we got the hang of it we were able to fill balloons very quickly. I just wish it could tie the balloon for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nica

customer_reviews.title: Completed the job without issue
customer_reviews.text: This machine was totally worth the $17 bucks. It saved so much time and a ton of money when I decided to DIY my balloon garland for a bday party. Professional company wanted $250 plus $100 for the job. I did the job myself for under $35.00. I read a few reviews and I didn’t have any difficulty using the machine. I took breaks per the reviews to not overheat the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make a ballon arch for 30th anniversary. Made blowing up 300 plus balloons much much easier. Works well for long periods of time on auto. Multiple attachments give the perfect fit... I used 6 inch balloons as well as 4 inch.
customer_reviews.author: kim b

customer_reviews.title: Must have when having little ones
customer_reviews.text: Omg where do I start ?! This is the best thing ever. We’ll be having some fun with this machine. It’s so light weight and filled with fun colors. I love that the cord is tuck inside a cover. It has a easy carry handle. It also has two spots to attach the nodes of u need it. It also has two options to function it. I did wish it had a low and high speed to blow up the ballons
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I truly recommend this for any event where you are going to enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this electric portable balloon inflator. This little thing is so powerful that you just keep blowing up lots of balloons in no time, you'll actually need two people aside to be tying the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Isela

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Saved me so much time & energy! It’s a bit loud, but it’s very durable and you don’t notice the noise after awhile. I originally bought it to make a balloon arch, and it helped get the job done easily & efficiently. It’s very well made, so I’m sure I’ll have it around for a bunch of other party’s too.
customer_reviews.author: Sala

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was great but way to noisy so we returned it. I was trying to set up and decorate before my daughter woke up for her quarantine graduation but I ended up blowing everything with my mouth
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment if you want to do a balloon arch.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't ever do a balloon arch without a pump. It helps to save hours of time and is easy and fast. The hardest thing is how to learn how to use the tie ring. Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Jaki

customer_reviews.title: Must have for building balloon arches!
customer_reviews.text: This saves so much time and effort! Never again will I blow up balloon the hard way. Super easy to use! I like to build balloon arches for birthdays and events and this makes my life 100x easier. I was able to blow up over 200 balloons with such ease. Must have product if you are trying to blow up a lot of balloons. No more hand pumps or blowing it up with your breath.
customer_reviews.author: Manivanh

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: unbelievable power! if you are needing multiple balloons blown up, this is the way to do it. absolutely worth every penny. it saved so much time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this !!!! It’s great going to make your time go way faster , very easy to use and it’s actually very light weight I was surprised I expected it to be a bit bulkier perfect on the go size and perfect compartment on the side to store cable !
customer_reviews.author: Agi

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for making some balloon arches and was so easy to use and did the job so quickly that I really wish I would've purchased this sooner for all the balloons we've blown up over the years for kids bday parties, etc.!! Best $ I've spent in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: JennK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it is easy to use and I made about 200 balloons with this baby. It started to get hot towards the end which made me wonder if it was going to last but it seems fine now! I definitely recommend this, it is a great investment for party throwing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this device. I had over 200 balloons to blow up and this device did EXACTLY what I needed it to do. This is strictly air and not helium so don’t get them confused. It was so easy to use until I had my 7 year old nephew blow the balloons up while I decorated.
customer_reviews.author: GeGe&#34

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get one earlier.
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I am so glad that I purchased this what would normally take me about an hour or two to blow up balloons took me only 35 minutes tops and I was able to do two balloons at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Easy and life saving
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver! I did a ballon arch and this made blowing up those balloons a breeze. Easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Small yet powerful
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this life saver.. It blows balloons super fast and makes life so much easier.. Definitely worth the investment and for only around $20, should have bought one years ago.. Its also small in size and that makes it convenient to store or travel with. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: S.M

customer_reviews.title: Let’s Party!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! This was the easiest machine to use and made blowing up balloons for an arch so easy! It’s lightweight and easy to tote around. It’s simple to use and saves a lord of time! Biggest issue is that it’s kind of noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Y

customer_reviews.title: Great inflator!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to inflate balloons at venues when doing balloon pop acts and it's perfect! Very light and portable. Easy to use. It is a bit loud, but not moreso than I expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Serpensortia

customer_reviews.title: Makes balloon arches so easy to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a year and half ago and wanted to finally review it. I bought this to help with my brothers baby shower and as of now I have used it for three baby showers a hand full of birthday parties, a football banquet and a graduation party. This is a must have for balloons and it is super easy to use. Love this item and now I love balloon arches!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janis Moore-Amiri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but really loud
customer_reviews.text: So worth the investment. This machine blows up balloons in like 3 seconds! It’s easy to use and small enough to easily store. My only complaint is that it’s really-really loud when blowing up a balloon. My baby & dog did not not approve of that.
customer_reviews.author: F. Mtz

customer_reviews.title: Must have for ballon art
customer_reviews.text: If your doing any kind of ballon art or just having a party and need to inflate some stuff. This is a must have. Worked great made ballon prep a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Smiletastic Day

customer_reviews.title: Double team fill in no time
customer_reviews.text: This pump is incredible, it made inflating 600 balloons a breeze. The best part is two people can inflate at once.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly sturdy and easy to use. Love it. Everyone with little ones should have this! Where were these when I was growing up. So glad I purchases it.
customer_reviews.author: Popnzs

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs one of these puppies! This thing is awesome! It’s so fun! It fills balloons sooooo easily compared to my lungs... I was not much of a balloon user before but I probably will be now! It’s pretty loud but maybe that just makes it that much more exciting to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCreary

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ... I used this for my daughters 7th Birthday Party I used it to blow up over 200 balloons and it worked great... I look forward to using it again soon...
customer_reviews.author: April Eccker

customer_reviews.title: A big help and durable
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. This is a big help in preparing my kids birthday celebrations. It’s durable and well made. I think it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Where Has This Been All My Life
customer_reviews.text: As a mom with little kids who LOVE balloons, this is a must have! It made blowing balloons up every easy for a balloon arch. We will definitely get a ton of use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at ALL! I plugged it in to every socket no luck! I need a refund
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's easy to use, and unless you're using it for a long time steadily it works fine. When it starts to over heat you need to let it cool down. It will just stop blowing for a moment. But that has happened once so far. Will get a stronger one at a later time. But for the price it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany brown

customer_reviews.title: Please Buy One- At least
customer_reviews.text: My new best party friend. Please grab one of these and I wish I had one 18 years ago when my kids were little! I should have some sort of muscle in my arm!!
customer_reviews.author: Lolita Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my baby shower and it so easy to use without pumping it or blowing the balloons. This is a must if you have kids to plan birthday parties. Makes your life so easy
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Saves time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, saved me so much time! Made several balloon arches with this and was able to make it faster. You can even blow up the mylar balloons with the little attachment that is comes with. Will be using this a lot. Does get hot if you have it on for a long time, I used the push nozzle so the air didn't blow out the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Salerno

customer_reviews.title: handy and compact
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller contraption then i thought but works exactly how i needed it to. Needed to to blow up tons of balloons for a party i was doing and it did the job! Also blew up an inflatable pool much faster than i would have done by mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two brands of electric balloon pumps including this one, I don't use this one because the nozzles get real hot when blowing up the balloons. But it does blow up balloons as expected
customer_reviews.author: kecia counts

customer_reviews.title: Breathsaver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a lifesaver (breathsaver). Perfect for blowing up balloons for decoration , parties, etc. definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Save your breath, this machine is great
customer_reviews.text: I've been working with balloons for well over 20 years, but never purchased an electric inflator. This is my new favority investment. Worked beautifully and so quick.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine for inflating balloons. Make sure to give the balloons a good stretch before. Machine inflates super fast.
customer_reviews.author: goingBananas

customer_reviews.title: Super cool balloon filler
customer_reviews.text: Filled a hundred balloons in no time easily, made a very good fun decor fir ceiling, maybe floor decor next time it’s all easy now 🤠
customer_reviews.author: scrajesh

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect the best highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this balloon pump! Great for balloon decorations & really easy to use i will recommend it to my friends & family i will order more later on for any reason 💯💯💯
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. I have been doing balloon arches/garlands for several years and this machine has made my life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: AKA

customer_reviews.title: Busy mom
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a product to invest in if you have little kids and all you do is Birthday parties. Easy to use, different nozzles for balloon sizes. Small enough to store and the cord does not stick out has its own compartment to store. Definitely a must buy !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, to carry on, and fast!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve done in the last 2 months! Inflates balloons and swing pools. Easy to use and take every where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Eliane

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life!! I easily made a 10ft balloon arch in about an hour instead of the 3hrs it would normally take me since I blew the balloons up with my own lungs lol
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, but tends to overheat so have to let ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item to inflate balloons for a arch. It works fine, but tends to overheat so have to let it rest, cool down before continuing. There were about 200 balloons in the arch, so needed to cool it down twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts balloon blowing time in half
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it's very easy to use and it saves so much time. Its lightweight and portable. It cuts blowing baloon up time in half. This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Honeyme

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late but was able to get a replacement and ended up returning the extra one. Saves so much time and saves from a headache from self blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Valencia

customer_reviews.title: It has a plug, no batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase because Party City was expensive. You can blow 4 balloons at one time and it's an automatic start and stop so you don't have to keep shutting it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever had to blow up balloons then you know why this is amazing. I should have bought this years ago! Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Graham

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the investment! My whole life I've been blowing up balloons, one at a time, by mouth... I'm so glad that I discovered this inexpensive alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and small
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, should have ordered sooner. Its loud but I expected that. Airs balloons up super fast. Light weight, small in size so perfect for storing away. Def reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Must have for balloon arches
customer_reviews.text: Ahh this little lifesaver was perfect!! I used it to blow up the balloon for a balloon arch and I would never attempt that project again without this mighty air blower. Love the 2 nossels and the fact that it can be left on because it only blows air when it is being pushed down on
customer_reviews.author: Allison M Kaler

customer_reviews.title: Good price; good quality over heats fast
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it over heats super fast; not sure if just mine came defective but if I use it for 10 mins continually, it feels very very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I usually make a balloon arch for my kids or parties and this saves time. It’s a must need item for balloons
customer_reviews.author: Arely Alvidrez

customer_reviews.title: life saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these to blow up balloons for a balloon arch. This was game changing!! Blows up balloons so fast and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Lace

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought a balloon arch kit and after reading the reviews for that, I made sure to buy this. It made blowing up all those balloons so easy! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

product_meta.title: NuLink Electric Portable Dual Nozzle Balloon Blower Pump Inflation for Decoration, Party, Sport [110V~120V, 600W, Rose Red]
feature_bullets: Light wight, portable external design. Fast inflation rate and time saving for any occasion
Classified as continuous and touch on two patterns. Double pump smart design (Push down mode and automatic continuous mode
COMPATIBLE BALLOON: Fits all kind of ROUND balloon [DO NOT FIT LONG BALLOON OR CARTOON BALLOON, PLEASE PURCHASE FROM ASIN B07F6WHWDX IF YOU NEED TO INFLATE LONG, TWIST, CARTOON BALLOON]
Color: Rose Red, Voltage: 110V~120V, Frequency: 50HZ, Motor Power: 600W, Pressure: 1300pa, Noise <95dB, Product Dimension: 7 3/4"x5"x6" (LxWxH), Product Weight: 1.2lbs
All NuLink products GUARANTEE defect free/ damaged & come with 1 Year warranty. Message us if you have any problems
